CELL.0: All usual residents aged 16 and over
CELL.2: 1-4 O levels/CSE/GCSEs (any grades), Entry Level, Foundation Diploma
CELL.3: NVQ Level 1, Foundation GNVQ, Basic Skills
CELL.4: 5+ O level (Passes)/CSEs (Grade 1)/GCSEs (Grades A*-C), School Certificate, 1 A level/2-3 AS levels/VCEs, Higher Diploma, Welsh Baccalaureate Intermediate Diploma
CELL.5: NVQ Level 2, Intermediate GNVQ, City and Guilds Craft, BTEC First/General Diploma, RSA Diploma
CELL.7: 2+ A levels/VCEs, 4+ AS levels, Higher School Certificate, Progression/Advanced Diploma, Welsh Baccalaureate Advanced Diploma
CELL.8: NVQ Level 3, Advanced GNVQ, City and Guilds Advanced Craft, ONC, OND, BTEC National, RSA Advanced Diploma
CELL.9: Degree (for example BA, BSc), Higher degree (for example MA, PhD, PGCE)
CELL.10: NVQ Level 4-5, HNC, HND, RSA Higher Diploma, BTEC Higher Level
CELL.11: Professional qualifications (for example teaching, nursing, accountancy)
